post.text: As of today, there have been nearly 2,300 cases of Zika confirmed in the United States. Hillary met with doctors in Miami to discuss the epidemic and how to keep us safe. cdc.gov/Zika

comment.author: Brooke
comment.text: If Hillary Clinton becomes president goodbye to all guns and welcome all refugees and open borders and welcome World War 3

replies.author: Devin
replies.text: Hillary Clinton hasn't held a full press conference in over 260 days. It's been 44 years since this ever happened. This is unacceptable and she should be pressured to do one. How can you run for President and not hold press conferences? She has no rallies for the next month except fundraisers. Is she quitting ?

replies.author: Valeriya
replies.text: Good lets get rid of the 2nd amendment

replies.author: Domenic
replies.text: LOL~ Has anyone noticed that Hillary posted this SAME "ZIKA" Video (in SPANISH) Thursday/18th?~ Guess she realized she had totally FORGOTTEN she needed to share it with ENGLISH-speaking Americans, too???

replies.author: Clay
replies.text: Valeriya Nope. If you want to live in a gun free society, move!
